workflow.description:
This workflow will set your ESXi Host vSS Networking to comply with the vSphere Security Hardening Guide alerts in vRealize Operations 7.0. The following settings are modified:
- For each vSS connected to the host, set "Forged transmits" to "Reject"
This addresses the following compliance symptoms:
-RP 1,2,3 - vNetwork.reject-forged-transmit-StandardSwitch - Forged Transmits policy is not set to reject
Note that the vROps symptom above is for vSS only, and as such only standard switches are updated with this workflow.
